website_summaries.verdict: Sony's wireless WH-XB900N headphones deliver powerful bass response and solid noise cancellation for the price.
pros: Quality audio performance, especially if you like boosted bass
Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant support
cons: Way too much bass unless you adjust the EQ

customer_reviews.title: Average sound and average noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and decent build quality. Very muffled sound. You have to constantly play with eq to make it sound decent. Overall very disappointing sound quality. Lacks any texture. Base is very muddy too. I bought on sale for 129 and doesn’t sound better than £20 headphones. I am surprised who are these people saying it sounds great. Noise cancellation is very limited. In my one day of use it blocked 80 pc sound from train and 50pc from tube. It didn’t block rumbling sound or chatter whatsoever. So average performance there too. I do not recommend this product whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: adil

customer_reviews.title: not most confortable ear cushions
customer_reviews.text: While i am ok with Noise cancellation, soung quality and battery life what made to give it 3 stars is that ear cushions are not very comfortable, also after an hour of using them ears start sweating. which never happened with Sony WH-H900 and Sony WH-CH700N. I could use them for several hours during my trips, and they never bothered me. While this model, being superior to those mentioned in many ways, lacks the simple user comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Umidjon Khashimov

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Overall these headphones aren't that great. Noise cancellation if you can call it that doesn't really work unless you turn your music up to the max. The ambient sound is a nice feature though. For the price these just aren't worth it I'd go for a cheaper pair for sure. One thing I will commend Sony for in this case is the battery life its quite impressive to spend 6+ hours listening to music constantly and still have 100% battery left.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for the noise cancelling!
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessarily complicated companion app, very poor noise cancelling and mediocre sound. If your happy with average-in-class sound quality but are buying primarily for the noise cancelling then go buy Beats Studio 3 instead (don’t be a snob until you’ve tried them - you won’t beat their noise cancelling, it’s insanely good). These Sony’s feel cheap, don’t include a nice case and don’t provide any form of effective noise cancelling that I could detect, other than the natural dampening of having sponges over your ears. With the Beats, the ANC is so good I have to lift them off my ears whilst vacuuming to check the vacuum hasn’t run out of battery as I cannot hear it running.
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the bass
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts a good 40hrs, sound cancelling not bad, you can put your hand over the one earphone to here any noise if needed. NFC connects straight to my samsung phone. Sound quality is really good if you like the extra bass. Was able to connect to my tv also with no problems. Touch pad works really well. Would recommend for the price. The 360 sound also makes a difference if you are signed up to one of the music apps this includes amazon hd music.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great features, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones for the price. The sound quality is great with the app providing the ability to dynamically change settings to give the sound to suit the music or show. Provides multiple settings for noise cancelling, ambient sound control and normal mode. Ambient sound control is great for phone calls where you can hear the surrounding but also your call. Hands free phone calls have great sound with almost all background noise being cancelled out. Would recommend these headphones, comparing to the next level up pair, these are great value for money with only a slight improvement in sound quality on the WH-1000MX3.
customer_reviews.author: Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these whilst on offer & really like them. I use them to connect to my phone whilst working from home & can pick up calls & chat quite comfortably. Sound on phone & feedback from callers has been great. Sound good & I found I can easily walk into other rooms without carrying the phone without any crackling. Have hooked it up to my laptop, phone & iPod. Bit peaved though that you had to buy headphones case as an extra - a hard case should be provided with these based on price.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Average Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Long story short: Average Sound Quality Average Noise Cancelling Good Mic Great Battery Poor value for money You can definitely buy much cheaper headphones with similar capabilities. Not so sure why some compare these with WH-1000X M3 ones! Yeah, price might be £100 less but really not worth it to bother with these; if you’re in doubt like I was, just go for M3 ones! I tried to do a saving but returned these and got the M3’s...great choice.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a black friday sale to try out over-head headphones as in-ear ones were quite uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time. This is perfect for flights and long study sessions. The noise cancellation also works really well, perfect for commuting. It is also very comfortable to have on for hours at a time and I really appreciate the quality for the price point. The touch controls make a lot of sense and I have never had an issue with bluetooth connectivity. Downloaded the sony app for a better experience and its really made listening to music so much more enjoyable. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: adf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones during quarantine when my neighbors decided to have very loud raves throughout the entire day. I am very happy with these headphones. They are comfortable to wear (I usually where them for several hours at a time), great battery life (only have to charge them maybe once a week), and have great sound quality. With the noise cancelling I have noticed that they are quite good at blocking out ambient noise, but voices can sometimes still come through. Even still, these headphones are relatively cheap for what you get - would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Mica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of cans
customer_reviews.text: I m not expert but it sounds awesome. I often listen to hip hop nowadays and thought this would work well as low end are often not pretty in headphones. This rocks. Word of wisdom, yes the bass is punchy but you can tune it in the app EQ. I found the default setting (flat) to fit my taste. Tried NTM - ma Benz and the voices are insane and bass is crazy whilst being just right. It s like finally being able to listen to a bass line or low breathing, it s part of the magic. Folk music sounds lovely and jazz too. Worth putting in your shortlist
customer_reviews.author: A. Roussel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality, charging lead far too short
customer_reviews.text: Had these about 2 months now and the battery life is very good. I have used them around 2 hours a day at times and lasted a up to couple of weeks at a time. The sound quality and base in my view is exceptional. They come with a bag to store and transport them in. The only downside is the pathetically short charging lead. (250mmish) so purchased a longer one. Hasn’t made charging times and longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger C

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an upgrade was a lill weary at first with the price but amazon was the cheapest at the time....when they arrived i downloaded the app and what can i say....I am very happy with the sound the noise cancelling is great....The extra bass works great if you like your bass that is, which i do lol....Connected to bluetooth no problem and battery life is really good too...I highly recommend that you download the app to set them up the way you like your sound....They fit great and are very comfortable for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: russell payne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Ease of setting up, Sound quality, The noise cancelling capabilities, The feel and comfort of wearing the headphones from long periods, Battery life, Bluetooth range, Looks and styling, Price (I paid £124.99 in deals but would happily pay full price for these) Cons: The touch pad to control volume/skip track etc isn't as good as physical buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Coupe

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fun with app
customer_reviews.text: Lot of fun, I like them, sound signature is good enough for casual listening, plus you have the app to change it or custom your own, comfort without glasses is OK, with my glasses muh. ANC, OK nothing spectacular, it has Bluetooth 4.2 good solid connection charging time, for a full charge that will take nearly six hours Disclaimer, "I paid for this myself", either during a lightning deal or full price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Bluetooth and Noise cancellation issues
customer_reviews.text: These *are not supported by Sony PS4* for Bluetooth, and they take at least two attempts for my Sony Bravia TV to discover. They work well with my (android version 9) phone. When connected via bluetooth, there is a high pitch quiet ringing in the left ear, and it is noticeable during quiet moments when listening to something.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good bass, average sound
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pair of headphones to replace my bose from a fees years ago and found these and decided to go for them, I saw that they emphasize the bass but also have very good general output. I have found them to be a vast improvement as most new technology is however the bass does seem to overpower alot of songs especially accoustic music. Overall I would recommend for the bass lover but if you would like to listen to softer music or audiobooks look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect. Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling could be better. But build quality & battery life are amazing. I love these headphones. Not sure whether to blame my phone or the headphones for sometimes tricky Bluetooth connecting but it's worth the 1 in 10 times I need to take a second look.
customer_reviews.author: Oisin Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I think I’ll be sticking with this range from now onward. Great sound quality, very comfortable, good battery life. You either love or hate the hand gesture controls and I love them, they’re easy to remember, not sure why anyone would have problems. I also like the control to stop noise cancellation briefly if you’re speaking with someone. You just place 3 fingers over the right side, and noise cancellation stops until you take your fingers off. Very responsive and you really notice the difference. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David Savill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my dad as a Christmas present, they are very good value fir money on the Amazon deal price that I paid for them. Very easy to set up and pair, the noise cancellation is also very good and on par with more premium headphones. It’s a real shame these Sony’s don’t hone with a hard case to protect them.
customer_reviews.author: Smooth45

customer_reviews.title: Connection Issues.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to treat myself. For some strange reason when l changed settings in the app they would disconnect l had to wait for them to pair and then the sound would return in that time the music would play through the phone speaker which could be embarrassing if you out in public. The sound was good but for me it was just not loud enough so l did return these. Please check out the soundcore q10 l have them and overall they sound better at less than half the price of these!
customer_reviews.author: Dupas Raja

customer_reviews.title: Much more than just headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I ever used. I may be biased as these are my first upgrade from the cheaper mPow headphones I used, but these blow me away. Sound is amazing, you can even make it work magic with the Google assistant to make it read notifications and give you information. It's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Bell

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I can listen to music without disturbing my neighbours (essential in lockdown!). The battery when charged lasts for ages. I like the way that they don't hiss at all and the quality of sound is excellent. The noise cancelling is good which is a disadvantage if you are listening for the doorbell! The price was excellent as I got them on a prime deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present to myself, after seeing someone one the tube with them. I didn't need new headphones, but got convinced by the cordless factor. I'm so glad I bought them! The battery power is amazing, I haven't had to charge them since the first time and I've been on a 2 week holiday with 2 8hr flights and then 2 3hr train journeys!! Sound is awesome for both music and film/TV. Totally recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these. The extra £100 for the XM3s is probably recommended if you plan on using in very noisy environments but for general home/office wear these are perfectly good and sound fantastic. The Sony connect app is a nice add on, allowing you to tune the sound to your preference. I went for the blue which I think looks a bit better than black given the plastic used
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Steal at this Price ***** Five Star*****
customer_reviews.text: At £129 these are great value. cannot fault them at all. Downloaded the app from google play (its called Sony Headphones Connect) and set them up in seconds. The sound quality is amazing. some great fetures and so easy to increase volume or pause and skip tracks just by sliding or pressing your fingures on the side of the right ear cup.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Consider these Sony’s before spending nearly double
customer_reviews.text: For the money these are amazing headphones you have control over the sound through the ap the defiantly live up to name extra bass but you can tone it down in settings great for house, tech-house, drum & bass & band music. Would highly recommend. Controls on headphones are great once you get used to how they work. I was going for 1000 that are nearly double in cost as I bought my first pair of these 900 for a present and ending just getting a pair myself. As I didn’t really need the extra noise cancelling you get going up a level.
customer_reviews.author: Storey34

customer_reviews.title: Super bass and holds its own , but NC not good
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones if you get them under 130 pounds. I have the mx2 and mx3 and these are a step above this but the sound of all three is great. The bass on these are heavy, but still great quality, not cheap sounding at all. Sound canceling is 1/4 of the mx3's , so if you're after that then get the MX3s
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great audio experience
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones the bass they kick out and clarity in sound, very good, They look and feel good to use, comfortable on the ears and head, the battery life is excellent. One problem is that it has a notification feature that doesn't work, if you don't disable it you get a constant bell notification noise that interrupts what you are listening to, Sony haven't fixed that so better to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Blazer

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them!! I’ve never used over ear/noise cancelling headphones before, so it took me a while to get used to the headphones pressing on the top of my jaw, which was quite uncomfortable. After I got used to it, however, I was able to fully appreciate the amazing sound quality these headphones provide. The bass is just absolutely extraordinary, and makes a seemingly mediocre song (when listened to with AirPods) absolutely phenomenal. The quality is premium (even though it’s mostly plastic), the weight is light, and look very clean and trendy. If you’re looking for a way to escape from reality during quarantine, then these are the headphones you need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with windows
customer_reviews.text: Been using these headphones for a while. The sound quality is good, noise cancelling is okay and i can live with them heating up my ears, but the big problem is the implementation of bluetooth. It is very unreliable when connected to my laptop. It tries to make mulitple connections, interferes with other input devices, the connection is inconsistent and regularly stops working or crashes my laptop. It does not support connections to multiple devices so i have been constantly re-pairing it to phone or laptop. Avoid this product if you want to use it for anything other than a single mobile device.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound - iffy controls
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth headphones I've used in a long time...However... The swipe gesture for skip song/volume work fine but I wish there was a button or even using the left earcup for pause. Pause takes me 3-4 taps everytime to actually work - very very iffy which stops this getting 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: J Beechey-hack

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall, but not the noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: The highlight of this headphone is noise cancellation. Especially in the windy environment and with the hood on, it's really annoying. In the same situation, I feel more comfortable with my another Marshall wired headphone without Noise cancelling. However, this phone is stylish, it is comfortable and the sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT THE CHARGING CABLE IS A JOKE
customer_reviews.text: Yes the charging cable has to be a joke should be at least 1ft long it's half that, only fault I can find, not heavy, comfy and easy to use. Update only lasted a few weeks no sound keeps loosing connection, sent back replacement, Sony help is rubbish, 3 times tried support and no answers just goes round in circles.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty53

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound, good value
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality, I did have to reduce the bass via the app but was expecting this having read reviews. The sound cancellation is brilliant and allows me to sit in my works loud canteen without disruption. I use them daily and hardly have to charge them, brilliant battery life and the Bluetooth connecting is extremely fast. Last thing I should mention is the comfort. The ear cups are nice and soft, and the headband is lovely. Most comfortable headphones I've owned. The only thing I would say is it tends to get quite hot wearing them after a while. Overall very hard to fault them, especially not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. O. A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: What i can say it just wow. I am really happy with sound quality, comfort, and battaey. I used before bose soundsportband had issues with that. This headphones even better then Sony's top 1000m. I could recomand this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Iuri

customer_reviews.title: Good but don't believe the claim of noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the claim of noise cancelling. For the money I would have expected much more Sent back in favour of the wh1000xm3. Yes it's a fair bit more but after owning the wh1000xm2 which failed after water damaged I sought a cheaper pair and learned my lesson. Otherwise a great headset.
customer_reviews.author: Dunc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Low price. Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for quality. Sound is really nice. Due to more bass it's not as crisp but still really good. Love the functions on the right earcup. (Swipe up down left or right)... And the best of all is the ability to hear surroundings with ambient function! It feels strange and yet so cool. Just touch your nfc ready smartphone to the left earcup and it will connect/disconnect itself! Never been more happy with a headphones purchase. I can reccomend. (Bought for 140€ at the time)
customer_reviews.author: Mattz44k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones. Sound is amazing. Noise Cancellation could be better but it does a good enough job for me I still actually like to be able to hear my surroundings. You still can faintly with these.They actually sound better than my b beats
customer_reviews.author: Nikieg20

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: That was a Xmas present. However, seeing my wife going out with all the time showed me how much she is attached to it. The other day, she left home and then came back after 3 minutes saying i forgot my headphones, I could not go without them so I had to come back..
customer_reviews.author: King David

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound, Defective?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the one I received was defective, sound was low, no bass and had to return it for a refund. I also wonder why Sony removed the bass boost. People say its got extra bass, that's why I bought it. So I don't know, maybe the one I got was defective.
customer_reviews.author: O. IGBEKOYI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: If in a quite place, noise cancelling works perfectly. As i am a student who travels a lot by bus, i walk a lot to the bus stop, usually can hear the cars passing by, but really depends on the songs you're listening to. Overall review: amazing product, have never been so satisfied with headphones before, highly recommend, especially for people who enjoy the extra bass. Excellent battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I’ve ever owned and glad I went for a brand like Sony. Great for making phone calls. Immersive sound. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My perfect wireless headphone
customer_reviews.text: The sound is perfect for my needs as a 30s guy. Overall 4.5 stars for sound, great soundstage as it surprisingly maintains good mid range, 5 stars for bass for today’s music 😃 but a slight loss of detail particularly on the high end trebles. A steal as it’s half the price of the flagship 1000 but it’s just one notch below in terms of quality. The only main criticism is noise cancellation which is ok but only fully implemented in the 1000. Do you really need it? Perhaps if you have a long noisy commute or frequently fly for work.
customer_reviews.author: hyrangea

customer_reviews.title: Lovely headphones good sound and bass and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I brought these to use on my cummut train into birmingham and in the office and they work great lovley sound quailty to my ears anyway. Battery is good I charge them once a week really. I have eve found the mic good enough for confrence calls an skype and teams.
customer_reviews.author: cavywavy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and money worth headphone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, the extra bass is amazing and the battery last one week of good usage for me. The noisy canceling is really good, it is just not better than the top notch Sony’s headphones, but as far as it has the same functions as it, the headphone is pretty much amazing. The only regret that I may have is not had bought the expensive one to have a perfect headphone. Any way, this one is much more than I need and totally money worth for those that want amazing sound quality and functionality and don’t want to spend more than 140€ .
customer_reviews.author: Vinícius P.

customer_reviews.title: Not as noise cancelling as I'd hoped!
customer_reviews.text: Generally these are good headphones, I've become used to the quality of Bose Quiet comfort 25s so was a little disappointed at how little noise was cancelled by these. I know they are not in the same price bracket but was swayed by good reviews for these elsewhere and took the plunge.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have medium ears.
customer_reviews.text: The quality was excellent. Good sound if a little on the bassy side. I returned them because the pressed on my ears, which are large. My partner, with small ears, said they really liked the headphones and wanted me to keep them for her! If you have big-huge ears give them a miss, otherwise you'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: ChopChop

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, good sound, sometimes a little warm on the ears
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on these is amazing. I've owned them 2 months and charged them less than 5 times, I use them daily at work too. I find if I wear them while walking for an hour my ears can get a bit sweaty though.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: I can’t recommend because of  wind noise
customer_reviews.text: Good looking headphones mine was blue good sound but a dead loss if it is windy the wind noise is terrible must be a design mistake, I won’t be getting anymore Sony headphones especially at there prices
customer_reviews.author: Monty Hole.Aberdare

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This headphone set will be classed my second best fr when doing jobs around the home. Excellent sound quality but I also have the BOSE QC 35 series 2. Now your talking quality but for what I want this for great. Excellent to keep nosey parkers away when you are on channel X.when privacy is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Better sound quality than XM3
customer_reviews.text: I got this and changed for the XM3 as I wanted better noise cancellation. However, I find the sound quality on this one is better than XM3, that is more expensive than this one. Very good quality headphones, I'd recommend getting this one over the XM3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOUND QUALITY IS 👌🏼.
customer_reviews.text: i’ve had it nearly 4 weeks now, charged it once and it’s still at 70%. i only use it a few times a week but it’s great that it keeps its charge for so long. music quality is amazing, better than my old pair of sennheisers! noise cancelling is okay, but there’s not much difference. not sure what to do with the ambient sound option but an all round good product!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Overall 5 stars because even though the noise cancelling doesn't completely cut you off from the world, it's enough for making a trip on a coach, jet or turboprop plane more enjoyable by far.
customer_reviews.author: David Dugmore

customer_reviews.title: Worth the 120£ price only.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality of noise cancelling as the Sony 1000 mx3 but for the 120£ price worth. Extra bass sounds very good. Sound quality good. Overall 100% worth for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios Solomos

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you like lots of bass
customer_reviews.text: Silly really but given the name of these headphones I was surprised just how much the bass was ramped up. I think that I will go for the WH-1000XM3 before too long.
customer_reviews.author: peter geering

customer_reviews.title: If you want noise cancellation Headphones look no further
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to our son in law , a captain with a well known airline, he wanted these because of the noise cancellation. He has just returned from a long flight and was absolutely delighted with how these Headphones performed particularly the ability to eliminate all external noise distraction when taking his rest periods
customer_reviews.author: Loanarranger

customer_reviews.title: As overhead earphones there probably the best A+++
customer_reviews.text: I use these earphones for heavy gym use, apart from making my ears sweat, these are fab. Take away all the ambient noise which allows you to focus on the exercise you're performing. Battery life is amazing, I cannot fault these headphones. Price comparison wise they're far better value than other competitors such as Bose
customer_reviews.author: Northern monkey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: superb sound quality. superb battery life. mobile aap has 5 equaliser mode. mic is also good but not recommended for official meeting in a crowdy place. it picks back ground noise. But works really great if you are talking in a meeting room. Overall its good. Based on the price I was expecting case which is not given.
customer_reviews.author: Bhabani

customer_reviews.title: the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: my favorite headphones so far. well built.sound is extreamly good. like the touch pad controls on the side. very long battery life with one charge. folds nicely
customer_reviews.author: tumixas

customer_reviews.title: Quality product bought on Warehouse deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought as very good from Warehouse deal Like new as far as I saw. Really pleased.Quality product. Takes a bit of getting used to with swipe gestures Noise cancelling fairly good.Sony connect app very useful to adjust sound.It was a bit too bassy for me, but lots of settings to change this.Would recommend especially if you pick one up cheaper on Warehouse and lucky to have a perfect condition like mine
customer_reviews.author: SIMON C

customer_reviews.title: Just made my day even better
customer_reviews.text: Walking gardening, superb found . Easy to use no issues. Like all over the ear headphones a little uncomfortable if you wear for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Happy Girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend. She is very happy with them. They're comfy and sound good. Only downside is the noise cancellation is a bit pants and they feel a little cheaply made for the cost, but then again I am used to my WH-1000XM3's.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing crisp vocals, punchy bass and the noise cancelling is brilliant - couldn't hear music from my friend's phone on full volume whilst listening with these headphones to my music. Feels really sturdy and good quality and the blue is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good pair of headphone however, one thing that I noticed is that it cannot connect to more than one device at a time. This is an important feature that all headphones must have. The bass is okay in these headphones but not out of the box, you have to use the Sony app to set it up. The noise cancelling is also mediocre it does not cancel out much noise from the environment. Not sure if these are worth the 140 Quid.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it at half price
customer_reviews.text: Gutted it’s not suitable/adaptable for my Sony smart T.V But for everything else it does the job I guess. Controls on side of headphones could be more responsive though. And made simpler
customer_reviews.author: DARREN LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth an audition
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is very good, though not quite up to Bose standard. Makes up for it in the sound quality. Excellent standard. My previous headphones have been Bose and Sennheiser. I’m very happy I gave these ones a try. Great phone conversations too
customer_reviews.author: Chriso

customer_reviews.title: Pure clean noise
customer_reviews.text: Good quality clean sound with deep bass. The only small gripe...if you have the phones on for too long they get sweaty! However I'm really impressed with the overall sound of them. So much so that I bought a pair for my wife as well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable, I put 4 star for the noise cancelling, they don't cut out all sounds but no matter how high you have the sound no one else can hear what you're listening too which is great! Awesome base and good quality sound
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Movies sound great with these headphones and they are very comfortable. There is (lots of) extra bass. NC works, good app and touch controls are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart 919

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: The strength of noise cancellation is minimal; hardly any. If you are after this function, you should go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: T. Papp

customer_reviews.title: Look great and sound great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and cancels out most noise. Not quite as good noise cancelling as Some Bose in-ear headphones I had before, but these are considerably cheaper so definitely still great! Very comfortable with lots of padding but they do get a little hot after prolonged use, but it’s not too bad. A brief break will usually do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Zara612

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in this price range. Nice fit. Quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the Sennheiser earlier and I have to change for this and It was a good decision. Much better quality. Perfect all over ear and comfty.
customer_reviews.author: Snake

customer_reviews.title: Not purist, but indulgent and absorbing audio.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, didn’t know what to expect but I have been really impressed. Midrange and higher frequencies have opened up over time, connectivity is great and it suits the majority of my music tastes....which is basically everything. Not “purist” audio but characterful and absorbing, definitely not clinical! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Western_100

customer_reviews.title: Almost on par with the big boys in headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is up there, but not as good as Bose or Sony 1000XMs. Nevertheless, it's pretty decent foe the money and sound quality is amazing with emphasis on the bass. Great additional features from the Sony app in regards to ambient sound, sound acoustics and equaliser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound pity about Noise Cancellation as I see no difference when it is activated
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Product as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this product. Has enjoyed listening to the radio or books on his phone while pottering in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These will suit anyone looking for a good pair of budget headphones, these were among the top in this price range last I checked.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Battery life doesnt go beyond 70%!!!
customer_reviews.text: They were good at first, but after only 2 months the battery doesn't charge beyond 70% and it runs out really quickly. They were very expensive and I expected high quality! Edit: I contacted Amazon via chat and they have issued a replacement - this was all stress free! Thanks ☺️ 🤞🏽 hopefully this pair will work better!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great sound quality. Comfortable, even for large heads like mine.
customer_reviews.author: SpongebobUK

customer_reviews.title: Just keep running...
customer_reviews.text: I use my headphones for the gym i've had no problems... Blocks all the annoying people out who go on their phones or who grunt when they run!! I can hear the stupid music of my gym a little so you need to turn up the volume a little more... A part from this they are great... Well made and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie8008

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied by sound and noise cancelation is decent too
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and decent noise cancelation for the price range. Not a sound expert but pretty loud and clear. Functions to control sound levels, skip song etc from the headphone are useful too. Battery life is great so far after 4 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: superb headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are really top class head phones comfy and excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.author: davidk

customer_reviews.title: Best bass headphones I used so far
customer_reviews.text: Had these headphones for a while now and there amazing built quality lovely sound with nice deep clean bass and with the headphone app to make your own eq as well also set the second button for google/Alex or noise cancelling
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They sound very good, let's see the quality of the materials so far it's good they are easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Matei

customer_reviews.title: Second best headphones I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Charge for 10 minutes, lasts 60 minutes is my favourite feature, bass is alright, its not head rocking, overall I recommend this to anyone who uses YouTube all day everyday, going for food? Put these on the charge, come back, unplug them and you'll get 60/120 minutes of battery, it's crazy technology.
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones - Great Sound and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received these headphones today and have worn them for 6 hours without a break and they're very comfortable. Sound quality is great - the extra bass is nice and to me the Mids & Highs are crisp and distinct. Very happy so far - Will update the review if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and just right price
customer_reviews.text: Good design and simple , easy to use Sound xbass awesome, fit to my ears 👂 once stick never release,
customer_reviews.author: N. Jonaswar

customer_reviews.title: A worthy must to your headphone collection
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cans. So comfortable and good bass levels. As they run in they get even better.
customer_reviews.author: Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Good value for money and excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.author: david g

customer_reviews.text: They were a present for my daughter who loves them, I've tried them out myself and they are extremely comfortable and the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tomo

customer_reviews.title: No good for noise cancciling.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life seems to be as advertised though I have used for about 6 hours and headphones say batteries are at 50%. Very happy with the Sound, & controls all in all happy with my purchase as I did not buy for noise cancelling .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair
customer_reviews.text: Its a great pair of headphones for most people, but for me i had a pair of skullcandy Venues and i have 2 phones and the venue can connect to both phones at the same time easily, this one cant do that... apart from that its pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Software update kills noise Cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Software update kills noise cancellation. If you are buying for nose cancellation please don't. Noise cancellation performance = zero
customer_reviews.author: Raja Mohammad Zishanullah

customer_reviews.title: Absolute bargain pair of Song Headphones
customer_reviews.text: For their price, these headphones are an absolute bargain. It has adaptive noise cancelling based on how much you do want to hear. The sound quality for all ranges is quite hard to fault at this price. The battery life always lasts longer than I expect it to
customer_reviews.author: Jaisal P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He is extremely well pleased. He's had it since Christmas
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: I got the defective product when i ordered it from amazon. Highly disappointed. When u turn on the headphones, you will hear a continuous irritating sound from right hand side ear. Hence i had to return the product. Never thought of such kind of quality from company like Sony
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Noise cancelling could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Overall all is a great pair of headphones. I thought the noise cancelling would be absolute. For music and audio is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Calles

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, for the comfort, sound and quality. Would definitely recommend to purchase. Unfortunately, I no longer have these headphones as I recently got them stolen from my head whilst listening to music. I would say be aware of your surrounding when wearing these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good the best I've ever heard and the comfort is good but when your hot it can be a bit sweaty. The noise cancelling is very good but not Bose qc35 quality
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Watson.

product_meta.title: Sony WH-XB900N Extra Bass Noise Cancelling Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with Mic, 30 Hours Battery Life and Quick Charge - Optimized For Google Assistant and Alexa – Black
product_meta.description: Colour Name:BlackSony wh-xb900n extra BASS wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones, up to 30 hours battery life, hands free call, Alexa - Black. When the noise canceling effect is not sufficient, make sure that the noise canceling function is turned on. Adjust the ear pad position to fit your ears. The noise canceling function is effective in low frequency ranges such as airplanes, trains, offices, near air-conditioning, and is not as effective for higher frequencies, such as human voices.
feature_bullets: Noise cancelling with enhanced deep punchy bass sound thanks to extra BASS technology
Up to 30 hours battery life and the quick charge feature will also give you 60 minutes of play time after just 10 minutes charge
Optimized for google assistant and alexa for a seamless hands-free control and more
Sleek design and long listen comfort, Frequency Response (Bluetooth Communication): 20 Hz–20,000 Hz (44.1 kHz Sampling)/20 Hz–40,000 Hz (LDAC 96 kHz Sampling, 990 kbps)

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
